value:
Glenn... Have I become closer to
being the kind of knight that inspires
others, like you once were?

Compared to my home, the Kingdom
of Askr is a very warm and pleasant
place to be. Honestly, I'm envious.

Whether it's horses or pegasi, you
should always treat them as dear
partners who will share your destiny.

Oh, $Nu!$k$pWould you care to join me in the
dining hall? ...Huh? What do you
mean "so soon?" That was hours ago!

Every time I wield this lance, I ask
myself—for what purpose did
I choose the path of knighthood?

I come bearing a message from
$Nf.$k$pThe next time a strong enemy
appears, we will fight as one!
My devotion will not waver!
I cannot afford to lose here!

I see. Now, to make the most of what
I have learned.

You're giving me something this
valuable?! I will not let your
thoughtfulness go to waste!

I am Ingrid Brandl Galatea. I aim to
walk the path of a loyal knight. With
this lance, I will be your strength.

My heart is what guided me to the
path of knighthood, but there are all
sorts of chivalric tales in Fódlan.$k$pIt's difficult to not admire the knights
in those tales, so I've always wanted
to be like them.$k$pBut...such knights who fought with
honor and virtue were merely
characters in legends and stories.$k$pIn the back of my mind, I warned
myself not to confuse those tales
with reality.$k$pAnd yet...there are great knights here
in the Order of Heroes befitting of
tales of their own!$k$pThey aren't mere characters, but
great predecessors who persevered
on the path to knighthood!$k$pThey are the ones I should be
learning from! Then, I will find my
own path to chivalry.$k$pWith this lance, I will surpass those
who came before me!
Prepare yourself.
I'll end this quickly!
Come back when you're ready.
No quarter!
Not here...
Upon my lance, I swear I will protect you.
Oh! You caught me with my guard down! I still have a lot to learn.
Have you read any chivalric tales? I can lend you some, if you're interested.
Pegasus knights are the specialty of House Galatea. I'm proud to set an example.
Could you point me to the stables? I want to care for the horses.
Perhaps I'll go for a stroll through the woods...
If you ever find yourself in trouble on the battlefield, you need only call my name. I promise I'll be there.
Understood.
My turn?
Allow me.
